title: High Up Trial Racing - WPS
descriptions: Upon joining West Pier Studio, I was given the chance to lead the development of a robust vehicle customization system in Unreal Engine 5. This was an attempt in trying to get visibility and acquire clients to co-develop AAA games.
As part of the process, I gained experience in:
&#x2022 Developed a full vehicle customization system (Parts, colors, liveries).
&#x2022 Implementation of blueprints that allow designers to easily create vehicle parts (Adding functionalities such as color/livery swap thanks to actor components) and add them to the game.
&#x2022 Created a fully packaged (portable) version of Unreal with PlayStation 5 build support to speed up the building process.
&#x2022 Designed and implemented custom UI widgets to overcome Unreal's UI limitations, such as pop-up buttons, bindable widgets, and a carousel system.
&#x2022 Designed and Implemented a proxy to easily bind widget events without the use of Unreal Functions (UFUNCTIONS).
&#x2022 Developed a custom UI navigation system that works with gamepads controls.
